definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Depressants are alcohol, barbiturates and sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 抑制药有酒精，巴比妥酸盐和镇静剂。

sentences.english: Conclusions Osteoclast-mediated bone resorption was inhibited by the bisphosphonate administration.
sentences.chinese: 结论双膦酸盐对破骨细胞性骨吸收有明显的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩粉碎，采煤，硅酸盐矿石内植入矿物。

sentences.english: Other scientists also have worked with low- phytate feed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，其他科学家也进行了低植酸盐饲料的研究。

sentences.english: Domestically, no cyanogen zinc acid salt galvanized is still the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 就国内而言，无氰锌酸盐镀锌仍是主流。

sentences.english: Chemical features of these granites are consistent with silicate liquid immiscibility.
sentences.chinese: 它们的化学特征可以用硅酸盐液态不混熔来解释。

sentences.english: Alkali-free aluminosilicate glass is a kind of special glass used in many fields.
sentences.chinese: 无碱铝硅酸盐玻璃是一种应用范围较广的特种玻璃。

sentences.english: When taken orally, bisphosphonates are poorly absorbed and have low bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 口服双磷酸盐的吸收率及生物利用度非常低。

sentences.english: As the rover trundled around, its wheels kicked up soil rich in sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 当漫游车四处工作时，车轮拖出了富含硫酸盐的泥土。

sentences.english: Tungstate competitively inhibits the utilization of molybdenum for the formation of xanthine dehydrogenases.
sentences.chinese: 钨酸盐竞争性地抑制钼的利用以形成黄嘌呤脱氢酶。

sentences.english: Chromate-based pigments as well as Lead salts used as dryers could be substituted.
sentences.chinese: 铬酸盐基颜料以及铅盐用于干燥剂可以替代。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of reserviors consisting of clastics and carbonates in Yakela Black.
sentences.chinese: 雅克拉断凸储层主要有碎屑岩和碳酸盐岩两大类。

sentences.english: The results of pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of lidocaine carbonate were compared with those of lidocaine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 将药代动力学及药效学研究结果与其盐酸盐进行比较。

sentences.english: Unreinforced, Super Tough polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 注坯模型的未加强，超级坚韧聚丁烯对苯二酸盐树脂。

sentences.english: Nitrate nitrogen removal from ground water by autotrophic denitrification in a packed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 固定床自养反硝化去除地下水中的硝酸盐氮。

sentences.english: Hexavalent chromium (Cr-VI) in chromate conversion coatings as surface treatment.
sentences.chinese: 表面处理用铬酸盐转化涂层中的六价铬。
